net.foxycorndog.jfoxylibpixel.components

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylibpixel.components.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Panel

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is the base for all of the other Components. Keeps all of the essential information such as the x, y, width, and height of the Component. As well as other important information.
    Since:
    Feb 27, 2013 at 3:26:41 PM, v0.1
    Version:
    Feb 27, 2013 at 3:26:41 PM, v0.1
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      • render

        public abstract void render()
